alert.note: Alert for Defiance (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 10:15PM EDT until July 27 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN DEFIANCE AND SOUTHERN WILLIAMS COUNTIES... At 1015 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bryan to 8 miles southeast of Edgerton In Williams County to near Hicksville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Defiance, Bryan, Edgerton, Stryker, Edgerton In Williams County, Farmer, Ney, Evansport, Brunersburg, Williams Center, Melbern, and The Bend. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
